tool_description: Access US zip code data enriched with latitude and longitude, enabling you to calculate distances between two locations or ZIP codes. Easily retrieve nearby ZIP codes based on location or ZIP code
name: US ZIP CODE
title: US ZIP CODE

api_list.name: Zipcode Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com/zipcode/73001"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com/zipcode/{zipcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: validate a zip code
api_list.description: check if a zipcode is valid one
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com/zipcode/10001/validate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
